item.title: Linear Regression in Python
item.description: What is Regression? Put simply, regression is a method for finding a relationship between variables… (view article on Medium) > Defining linear regression and implementing an example in python: * Boston Housing dataset * Visualization in matplotlib * Mean Squared Error (MSE)
